article.title: Army Awards Guantanamo Bay IT Contract
article.text: Intelligent Decisions Inc., Ashburn, Virginia, was awarded a $6,848,385 modification (P00005) to contract W912CL-14-C-0018 for information technology operations and maintenance for U.S. Southern Command Joint Task Force-Guantanamo Bay Cuba with an estimated completion date of July 22, 2016. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance funds in the amount of $6,848,385 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Ft. Sam Houston, Texas, is the contracting authority.
